languages.text: After receiving a large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased, and it also gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

languages.text: 此生物承受高额{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}之后，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}均会提高，并获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 此生物承受高额伤害之后，{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}均会提高，并获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}。

languages.text: После получения значительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} существо усиливает свою {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, а также получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}.

traits.locale_text: После получения значительного урона существо усиливает свою {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, а также получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}.

После получения значительного урона существо усиливает свою {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитие брони{/g}, а также получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}.

languages.text: 大量の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた後、この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通力{/g}が増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}も得る。
languages.original_text: After receiving a large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased, and it also gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 大量のダメージを受けた後、この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}も得る。

languages.text: Tras sufrir una gran cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} de la criatura aumentan y recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}.
languages.original_text: After receiving a large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased, and it also gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tras sufrir una gran cantidad de daño, la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} de la criatura aumentan y recibe un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}.

languages.text: Erleidet diese Kreatur hohen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, erhöhen sich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und sie erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}.
languages.original_text: After receiving a large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased, and it also gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nimmt diese Kreatur eine große Menge Schaden, erhöhen sich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und sie erhält außerdem einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque cette créature subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} importants, elle obtient un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} ainsi qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}.
languages.original_text: After receiving a large amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} are increased, and it also gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette créature subit des dégâts importants, elle obtient un bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} ainsi qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, büyük miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldıktan sonra {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerleri artar. Ayrıca bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır.
